column4: everytime I open a gnome-terminal the menubar is on, but I have it disabled in my default session.  Oddly enough the 'view' menu indicates that it is disabled, and I have to 'enable' it to disable it.  Is this a known bug?
you want to be looking around on Launchpad, not on IRC ;)
ah, sorry.  I was thought the ubuntu unity stuff was called launcher
